text: Karen Patricia Scavotto (born 17 April 1982 in Danbury, Connecticut) is an American archer. She now resides in Enfield, Connecticut, and is an alumna of Enfield High School. She is currently ranked fifth in the world by the International Archery Federation. She competed in archery at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== * sports-reference Category:1982 births Category:American female archers Category:Olympic archers of the United States Category:Archers at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Archers at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Archers at the 2007 Pan American Games Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Danbury, Connecticut Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for the United States Category:People from Enfield, Connecticut Category:Pan American Games medalists in archery
title: Karen Scavotto
